comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Eleonore Caroline Gasparine Louise, Princess Reuss-Köstritz (August 22, 1860 - September 12, 1917) was Tsaritsa of Bulgaria and the second wife of Tsar Ferdinand of Bulgaria. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleonore,_Princess_Reuss-K%c3%b6stritz for bio and picture. To quote: Eleonore came into her own during the Balkans and First World Wars when, working tirelessly as a nurse, she was a cause of great comfort for many injured and dying Bulgarian soldiers. It was said that she had "a special gift for relieving suffering".

comment.author: 23103743@N05
